metadata.title: CVE-2024-28833 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts with two factorauthentication methods in Checkmk 2.3 before 2.3.0p6 facilitatesbrute-forcing of second factor mechanisms.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
